definition: hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: There is a TV set, a stereo system and a number of chairs in the sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 客厅里有一台电视机，一套组合音响和一些椅子。

sentences.english: The music centre with original conception affords you happiness and vigour.
sentences.chinese: 构思新颖组合音响，带给您快乐与活力。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
